title: With â‚¹27,000 crore, Adani tops KSK Mahanadi bidder list
description: Banks had received a total of 10 financial bids for the thermal power company by Thursday evening. Other bidders include Capri Global Holdings, Coal India, NTPC, Vedanta, JSW Energy, Naveen Jindal-owned Jindal Steel & Power, iLab India Special Fund, Rashmi Metaliks and Sherisha Technologies, said the people cited above.
